text: Limonium strictissimum is a species of plant in the family Plumbaginaceae. It is found in France and Italy. Its natural habitat is Mediterranean-type shrubby vegetation. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== strictissimum Category:Matorral shrubland Category:Flora of Italy Category:Flora of France Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Critically endangered biota of Europe Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Limonium strictissimum
